name: Doubler Mayhem
description:
*If you want to test the game go here I have been using SumRndmDde's hud maker plugin wich is broken if you want to play the game online so if you want the full experiance make sure to download!*

Play game online

In doubler mayhem you take on the role of Anthony Doubler who has to defend earth against weird alien entities.
This game contains: •Arcade mode

Get the highest score

•Levels

Fight through 20 increasingly harder levels

•Difficulty levels

Choose between 3 difficulties

•Unlockables

Unlock pointless cosmetic stuff

•No autosave

Make sure to manually save or lose all progress
